github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Be extremely descriptive in your commit message. This will help you and your team understand the changes you made in the future. If you're fixing a bug, include the issue number in the commit message. If you're adding a new feature, include a brief description of the feature. If you're refactoring code, include a brief description of the refactoring. If you're updating documentation, include a brief description of the documentation update. If you're updating tests, include a brief description of the test update. If you're updating dependencies, include a brief description of the dependency update. If you're updating configuration, include a brief description of the configuration update. If you're updating assets, include a brief description of the asset update. If you're updating styles, include a brief description of the style update. If you're updating scripts, include a brief description of the script update. Add lots of emojis! ðŸŽ‰
